W3C F44 Failure Test Case

This page demonstrates tabindex > 0 creating incorrect focus order.

  1. Homepage
  2. Chapter 1
  3. Chapter 2
  4. Chapter 3

When using Tab key, the order will be:

  1. Homepage (tabindex=1)
  2. Chapter 3 (tabindex=2)
  3. Chapter 2 (tabindex=3)
  4. Chapter 1 (tabindex=4)

Expected violation: tabindex rule should detect values > 0
